name: Procedural Life
description:
A procedural world generator. 

Can generate plane worlds or 3d way worlds.

Keys:

ESC to get mouse, right mouse to focus mouse back in browser.

player controls -

AWSD to walk, space bar to jump

NOTE: water tile shader  and mouse right click feature is not working.

Current Application:

  1.  Can create plane 3d worlds.
  2. Customize world(different species for trees rocks grass etc...)
  3. Player can interact with world item.

future updates:

  1. chunk system.
  2. A plugin for Godot engine.
  3. Animal simulation.
  4. Better Control on world creation.

future plugin features:

Procedurally generate world for your game, just provide your ready nodes into the given folder and save the result you liked!

Source code: here

Credits -

Engine: Godot

Assets: devilshop

Back ground sound: Zapsplat
